meanings.definition: A Greek dish made from mashed potatoes, garlic, olive oil, and vinegar.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother makes delicious skordalias for family dinners.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served skordalias as a traditional Greek side dish.
meanings.sent3: The skordalias was so garlicky that it could ward off vampires!
meanings.sent4: The creamy skordalias was a flavorful blend of garlic and potatoes.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the skordalias filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A thick paste or sauce made from garlic and bread.
meanings.sent1: The skordalias spread on the bread added a zesty flavor to the sandwich.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a tangy skordalias to accompany the grilled meat.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the skordalias for peanut butter on my toast!
meanings.sent4: The skordalias coated the dish with a rich and savory essence.
meanings.sent5: The pungent skordalias enhanced the taste of the roasted vegetables.
